Class TestActor

public class TestActor
extends java.lang.Object

A class which tests an Actor object under controlled circumstances.

Method Summary
 void setUp()
          Sets up an actor to be tested.
 void testActor_ChangeFacing_ActorState()
          This test checks that when an actor is changing direction that its actor state is updated to reflect this.
 void testActor_ChangeFacing_FaceEast()
          This test checks that an actor can change to face the required correctly.
 void testActor_ChangeFacing_Frozen()
          This test checks that an actor cannot change direction facing while in being frozen.
 void testActor_InitialisedState()
          This test checks the initialised state of an actor.
 void testActor_TeleportToPosition()
          This test checks that an actor can teleport to a new position.
